profile.profileName: Werner H. Kramarsky Collection/About Drawing, New York, NY
profile.profileDescription: A profile for a private art collection

label.name: Description
label.description: An account of the resource.

label.name: Caption
label.description: Short descriptive caption for item.

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Coordinates documenting the location of the item

label.name: Date
label.description: A point or period of time associated with an event in the life cycle of the resource.

label.name: Library of Congress Subject Headings
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Languages
label.description: A language of the resource.

label.name: Alternate identifiers
label.description: Any additional unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context.

label.name: GeoNames
label.description: A Geographic lookup that takes search text, passes it to the GeoNames search service and provides a drop down with search results (ordered by score). Selected geoname is stored as both text (name, country, continent and ID) and the service URL identifier.

label.name: Height
label.description: Height of Object

label.name: Width
label.description: Width of Object

label.name: Depth
label.description: Depth of Object

label.name: Height
label.description: Height of Object

label.name: Width
label.description: Width of Object

label.name: Depth
label.description: Depth of Object

label.name: Donee Inventory Number
label.description: Recipient institution's new inventory number for the artwork

label.name: Donee Object URL
label.description: A permalink to a webpage on the recipient institution's website that showcases the artwork

label.name: Rights Specifications
label.description: This is for image-specific specs for restrictions indicated by rights agent: maximum dpi, download restriction, etc.

label.name: Donee Specifications
label.description: This is for image-specific specs for restrictions indicated by rights agent: maximum dpi, download restriction, etc.

label.name: Exhibition Date Range
label.description: The full date range of the exhibition including traveling segments

label.name: Authorization date
label.description: The date when the loan was authorized.

settings.setting:
^ca_occurrences.preferred_labels
Venue: ^ca_entities.preferred_labels
Exhibition Dates: ^ca_occurrences.exh_dates
Traveling Details: ^ca_occurrences.travel_details.travel_details_originating, ^ca_occurrences.travel_details.travel_details_location (^ca_occurrences.travel_details.travel_details_date)

^ca_loans.preferred_labels
Borrower: ^ca_entities.preferred_labels
Loan Dates: ^ca_loans.loan_period
^ca_loans.loan_note

role.name: Wynn
role.description: Allows Wynn to search and add private notes
